mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY(inquiry_num, member_num, inquiry_name, inquiry_detail, inquiry_picture, inquiry_date, inquiry_type) VALUES(#{inquiry_num},#{member_num},#{inquiry_name},#{inquiry_detail}, #{inquiry_picture}, #{inquiry_date},#{inquiry_type})
mapper.select: select MAX(CAST(inquiry_num AS UNSIGNED)) AS inquiry_num from INQUIRY

select count(*) from INQUIRY WHERE INQUIRY_TYPE LIKE "%T%"
AND INQUIRY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
select count(*) from INQUIRY WHERE MEMBER_NUM = #{member_num}

SELECT M.MEMBER_NICKNAME , I.INQUIRY_NUM , I.MEMBER_NUM , I.INQUIRY_NAME , I.INQUIRY_DETAIL , I.INQUIRY_PICTURE , I.INQUIRY_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(I.INQUIRY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS INQUIRY_DATE_FORMAT , I.INQUIRY_TYPE , IF(A.AS_NUM IS NOT NULL, '답변완료', NULL) AS ISANSWERED , A.AS_NUM , A.AS_DETAIL , A.AS_DATE FROM INQUIRY I LEFT JOIN MEMBERS M ON I.MEMBER_NUM = M.MEMBER_NUM LEFT JOIN ANSWER A ON I.INQUIRY_NUM = A.IQ_NUM WHERE I.INQUIRY_NUM = #{INQUIRY_NUM}

SELECT M.MEMBER_NICKNAME , I.INQUIRY_NUM , I.MEMBER_NUM , I.INQUIRY_NAME , I.INQUIRY_DETAIL , I.INQUIRY_PICTURE , I.INQUIRY_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(I.INQUIRY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS INQUIRY_DATE_FORMAT , I.INQUIRY_TYPE , IF(A.AS_NUM IS NOT NULL, '답변완료', NULL) AS ISANSWERED , A.AS_NUM , A.AS_DETAIL , A.AS_DATE FROM INQUIRY I LEFT JOIN MEMBERS M ON I.MEMBER_NUM = M.MEMBER_NUM LEFT JOIN ANSWER A ON I.INQUIRY_NUM = A.IQ_NUM WHERE I.INQUIRY_NUM = #{INQUIRY_NUM}

SELECT M.MEMBER_NICKNAME , I.INQUIRY_NUM , I.INQUIRY_NAME , A.AS_NUM , A.AS_DETAIL , A.AS_DATE FROM INQUIRY I LEFT JOIN MEMBERS M ON I.MEMBER_NUM = M.MEMBER_NUM LEFT JOIN ANSWER A ON I.INQUIRY_NUM = A.IQ_NUM WHERE 1 = 1
AND I.INQUIRY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
AND CAST(I.INQUIRY_NUM AS UNSIGNED) < #{inquiryNum} AND I.INQUIRY_TYPE LIKE "%T%" ORDER BY ABS(CAST(I.INQUIRY_NUM AS UNSIGNED) - #{inquiryNum}) LIMIT 1

SELECT M.MEMBER_NICKNAME , I.INQUIRY_NUM , I.INQUIRY_NAME , A.AS_NUM , A.AS_DETAIL , A.AS_DATE FROM INQUIRY I LEFT JOIN MEMBERS M ON I.MEMBER_NUM = M.MEMBER_NUM LEFT JOIN ANSWER A ON I.INQUIRY_NUM = A.IQ_NUM WHERE 1 = 1
AND I.INQUIRY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
AND CAST(I.INQUIRY_NUM AS UNSIGNED) > #{inquiryNum} AND I.INQUIRY_TYPE LIKE "%T%" ORDER BY ABS(CAST(I.INQUIRY_NUM AS UNSIGNED) - #{inquiryNum}) LIMIT 1

SELECT * , DATE_FORMAT(I.INQUIRY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS INQUIRY_DATE_FORMAT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CAST(I.INQUIRY_NUM AS UNSIGNED)) AS RN , IF(A.AS_NUM IS NOT NULL, '답변완료', NULL) AS ISANSWERED FROM INQUIRY I LEFT JOIN ANSWER A ON I.INQUIRY_NUM = A.IQ_NUM WHERE I.MEMBER_NUM = #{member_num} ORDER BY CAST(INQUIRY_NUM AS UNSIGNED) DESC LIMIT #{pageDTO.startRow}, #{pageDTO.pageSize}
